Name: Fatui Pyro Agent
Title: "Blade of Settlement" Agent
Desc: "There is no running from your debt, be you living or otherwise."
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Fatui Pyro Agent

C123011.Name: Stealth
C123011.Desc: The character to which this is attached takes -1 DMG and deals +1 DMG.\n$[K3]: 2

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

23014.Name: Stealth Master
23014.Desc: (Passive) When the battle begins, this character gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C123011]</color>.
